title: Low Elo?
body:
just an opinion of mine, i am currently in silver 3 promos heading to silver 2, my goal is to reach gold by the end of the season.
I have been seeing what i think are great changes in the higher elo bringer the solo carry aspect of the game back which leads to a more competitive ranked experince. I just want to know when the low elo solo queue is coming back, or if it isn't, why so?

replies.body: why would solo queue even matter in low. this dynamic system is designed for the average player

So far they are just rolling out the changes as a quick-fix bandaid for high elo until the end of the season. 

If any changes are to happen with the low elo ranked, they are going to be part of the 2017 ranked season, something that is currently being worked on and [will be announced later this month along with the end of season rewards. ](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/riot-pls-ranked-pls)

solo q is only for higher elo Diamond+ 

below Diamond there is no solo Que

Probably not. Majority of players are in low elo and it would kinda suck if you couldn't queue with friends in ranked.

Competitive integrity matters more to Riot in the high ranks because it is such a skilled level of play, which I think is perfectly fine.
